mapper.select: select count(id) as value, '未使用' as name from tb_user_coupon where coupon_id = #{id} and status = 1 union select count(id) as value, '使用' as name from tb_user_coupon where coupon_id = #{id} and status = 0 and used_status = 1 union select count(id) as value, '过期' as name from tb_user_coupon where coupon_id = #{id} and status = 0 and used_status = 0
